info.name: YouTube Colored Like & Dislike Buttons
info.description:
Colored inlay and shadows for the Like & Dislike buttons.
Like: Pure Green
Dislike: Pure Red

These look best on a dark YouTube userstyle, but should work fine on a standard user style.
info.additionalInfo: Based upon code featured in "YouTube - Fix new look with elements from old look" by ssokolow
